summary: *As requested* Classic and alternate saves of my last \"test toon\". The character is all clean in both.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uTCesEm.jpg[/IMG][/center]
*****UPDATE*****
New classic save, just after the creation menu (before u\'ll see your head roll on the flour :P). With proper modz installed, it will eventualy resolve the \"I\'m stuck\" issue.

SKSE IS NEEDED!! (For E.C.E mod)
*****/UPDATE*****

First of all, I created this toon, just for my personnal use, to test several modz from this community.
After I uploaded screens with her, some people asked me to forward my savegame, for their own use.

So I decided to do it in two ways:

1- Classic savegame
Saved just after character creation in Helgen, lvl1, clean, unstuff

2- Alternate savegame (specific request)
For [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start[/url] users, by Arthmoor.
Saved just after character creation, no path chosen.

The files are just savegames for now. If some people want, I could try to create a standalone/follower version, later.

Sooo... To have the proper result, U\'ll need to install the modz I listed below, and all credits come to their creators.

At last, a question remains, why doing such a huge page for just a poor savegame?
I didn\'t know what to do this afternoon, so it made my day ^^


[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FhBgIBa.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Here are the modz totally required to obtain the same results as my screens.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]E.C.E[/url] by ECE team
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35713/?]E.C.E.E[/url] by RAN46
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267//?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by hellosanta
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] bye hellosanta
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30823]Iridium Eyes Retexture[/url] by Halendia


[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SM5buXD.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Here are the modz I used to up the screens quality (from my point of view)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase body[/url] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
SG Hair Pack by hellosanta
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160/?]Sexy Vanilla Armor[/url] by CrossCrusade
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11691/?]Twohanded Dawnbreaker[/url] by gaijune
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781/?]Project ENB Final for CoT[/url] by Bronze316
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start[/url] by Arthmoor.


[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FpehO0a.jpg[/IMG][/center]

All the credits go to the modz creators I used, listed before
Nothing for me, I just twitted some parameters.

Last thing, if u want to use the result for other projects, just let me know. 

Thanx ^^
author: heretika
